### Tutorials and presentations

I am a contributor and instructor for the Introductory R tutorials in the Columbia Psychology Department.The tutorial materials are publicly available on the [Columbia Psychology Scientific Computing Group](https://cu-psych-computing.github.io/cu-psych-comp-tutorial/) github.

[Learning Github and R studio](talks/labmtg_github_rstudio.pdf). See my presentation on how to integrate R projects with github to enhance workflow organization and reproducibility in the lab. 

### Teaching with R 

*2018-2019*  Teaching Assistant for Jared Lander's course on [Introduction to Programming in R](https://www8.gsb.columbia.edu/courses/mba/2019/spring/b8144-001), offered at the Columbia Business School. 

*Spring 2019* Teaching Assistant for Research Methods class in Columbia Psychology department. I Lead curriculum development for semester-long laboratory sessions on data cleaning and analysis using R.

### R community 
I am a member of [NYC R ladies](https://www.rladiesnyc.org/), which is part of a worldwide organization to promote gender diversity in the R community.
